document.heading: PHYSICIANS FREE CLINIC ASSISTANCE PROTECTION AMENDMENT ACT OF 1991, BILL 9-42

history.narrative: Law 9-41 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-42, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 4, 1991, and July 2, 1991, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 24, 1991, it was assigned Act No. 9-78 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
